short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Populate Listing data in Social Media Marketplaces From Revision !

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension uses product Information(Title, Price, Brand, Description etc.) from Revision Application to populate Marketplace Item for Listing .
